articles.title: Four ways the end of Roe v Wade has changed America - BBC
articles.description: After a Supreme Court ruling, many states banned abortion - but now more Americans want it kept legal.
articles.content:
A year ago, the US Supreme Court delivered a historic ruling that ended the nationwide right to abortion, impacting the lives of millions of women and transforming the political landscape.
